At the 2025 Korean Geography Conference held on June 27–28, our lab’s master’s degree candidate, Hyemin, presented her thesis titled “Regionalization of the Seoul Metropolitan Area Using Graph Transformer-Based Representation Learning and Spatially Constrained Clustering.” Congratulations to her, and we wish her all the best after graduation!
